articles.title: Trump moves to gut landmark environmental law
articles.description: Donald Trump on Thursday announced another rollback of a major environmental regulation, this time affecting infrastructure projects.

articles.title: MTP Daily 1/9/20
articles.description: MTP Daily is a public affairs program hosted by Chuck Todd that follows the Trump administration and features the top news-makers of the day as they analyze and break down the issues.

articles.title: Business genius Donald Trump thinks your 409K could be up 90%
articles.description: Thing 1/Thing 2: Businessman President Donald Trump proves once again that he developed a keen grasp of the subject matter at the Wharton School.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Chris Hayes on the nightmare in Puerto Rico
articles.description: Two days after large quakes hit the island, many Puerto Ricans are still without power and water.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: ‘Frustration and déjà vu:’ Butler on increasingly toxic rhetoric from Trump loyalists
articles.description: Jeremy Butler, CEO for Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America on Trump loyalists’ dangerous rhetoric surrounding opposition to war: “It’s frustration and it’s déjà vu.”

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Navy veteran Rep. Sherrill on why she voted for war powers resolution
articles.description: Congresswoman Mikie Sherrill tells Chris Hayes, “If our soldiers and sailors are going to be brave enough to go overseas to fight for this country, we in Congress have to be brave enough to engage in these debates.”

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: While Australia burns, Trump curbs environmental reviews in infrastructure projects
articles.description: Fires continue to burn across Australia and while the president spoke on the topic, Chris points out what Trump did: He proposed degrading half-century old environmental impact statements. He proposed killing the ability of local communities, native American …

articles.title: Leon Panetta says there’s many ‘mixed messages’ in Trump’s Iran strategy
articles.description: On Trump’s strategy with Iran, former Secretary of Defense Leon Panetta says "We're dealing with a situation with so many mixed messages."

articles.author: Msnbc
articles.title: House passes measure seeking to limit Trump's military actions against Iran
articles.description: The House adopted a war powers resolution Thursday with the aim of limiting President Donald Trump’s military actions against Iran.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Ro Khanna on War Powers Resolution: We need to exercise power of purse
articles.description: The House passed a measure, largely along party lines, that asserts that President Trump does not have unchecked authority to take military action.
